mapper.update: update l_grain_inspect_item set keyid=keyid ,inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} ,upperlimit=#{upperlimit} ,lowerlimit=#{lowerlimit} ,upperstandard=#{upperstandard} ,upperamount=#{upperamount} ,lowerstandard=#{lowerstandard} ,loweramount=#{loweramount} ,grade1=#{grade1} ,grade2=#{grade2} ,grade3=#{grade3} ,grade4=#{grade4} ,grade5=#{grade5} ,grade6=#{grade6} ,gradesame=#{gradesame} ,isdedu=#{isdedu} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} where keyid=#{keyid}

update l_grain_inspect_item set keyid=keyid ,grainid=#{grainid} ,inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} ,upperlimit=#{upperlimit} ,lowerlimit=#{lowerlimit} ,upperstandard=#{upperstandard} ,upperamount=#{upperamount} ,lowerstandard=#{lowerstandard} ,loweramount=#{loweramount} ,grade1=#{grade1} ,grade2=#{grade2} ,grade3=#{grade3} ,grade4=#{grade4} ,grade5=#{grade5} ,grade6=#{grade6} ,gradesame=#{gradesame} ,isdedu=#{isdedu} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and inspectitemid=#{Where_inspectitemid} and upperlimit=#{Where_upperlimit} and lowerlimit=#{Where_lowerlimit} and upperstandard=#{Where_upperstandard} and upperamount=#{Where_upperamount} and lowerstandard=#{Where_lowerstandard} and loweramount=#{Where_loweramount} and grade1=#{Where_grade1} and grade2=#{Where_grade2} and grade3=#{Where_grade3} and grade4=#{Where_grade4} and grade5=#{Where_grade5} and grade6=#{Where_grade6} and gradesame=#{Where_gradesame} and isdedu=#{Where_isdedu} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.upperlimit "upperlimit", t.lowerlimit "lowerlimit", t.upperstandard "upperstandard", t.upperamount "upperamount", t.lowerstandard "lowerstandard", t.loweramount "loweramount", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.gradesame "gradesame", t.isdedu "isdedu", t.orderno "orderno", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_grain_inspect_item t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.upperlimit "upperlimit", t.lowerlimit "lowerlimit", t.upperstandard "upperstandard", t.upperamount "upperamount", t.lowerstandard "lowerstandard", t.loweramount "loweramount", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.gradesame "gradesame", t.isdedu "isdedu", t.orderno "orderno", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_grain_inspect_item t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.upperlimit=#{upperlimit} and t.lowerlimit=#{lowerlimit} and t.upperstandard=#{upperstandard} and t.upperamount=#{upperamount} and t.lowerstandard=#{lowerstandard} and t.loweramount=#{loweramount} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.gradesame=#{gradesame} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.upperlimit "upperlimit", t.lowerlimit "lowerlimit", t.upperstandard "upperstandard", t.upperamount "upperamount", t.lowerstandard "lowerstandard", t.loweramount "loweramount", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.gradesame "gradesame", t.isdedu "isdedu", t.orderno "orderno", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_grain_inspect_item t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.upperlimit=#{upperlimit} and t.lowerlimit=#{lowerlimit} and t.upperstandard=#{upperstandard} and t.upperamount=#{upperamount} and t.lowerstandard=#{lowerstandard} and t.loweramount=#{loweramount} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.gradesame=#{gradesame} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
mapper.delete: delete from l_grain_inspect_item where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and inspectitemid=#{Where_inspectitemid} and upperlimit=#{Where_upperlimit} and lowerlimit=#{Where_lowerlimit} and upperstandard=#{Where_upperstandard} and upperamount=#{Where_upperamount} and lowerstandard=#{Where_lowerstandard} and loweramount=#{Where_loweramount} and grade1=#{Where_grade1} and grade2=#{Where_grade2} and grade3=#{Where_grade3} and grade4=#{Where_grade4} and grade5=#{Where_grade5} and grade6=#{Where_grade6} and gradesame=#{Where_gradesame} and isdedu=#{Where_isdedu} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.upperlimit "upperlimit", t.lowerlimit "lowerlimit", t.upperstandard "upperstandard", t.upperamount "upperamount", t.lowerstandard "lowerstandard", t.loweramount "loweramount", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.gradesame "gradesame", t.isdedu "isdedu", t.orderno "orderno", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", li.itemname "itemname", lg.grainname "grainname" from l_grain_inspect_item t left join l_inspect_item li on li.inspectitemid=t.inspectitemid left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.upperlimit=#{upperlimit} and t.lowerlimit=#{lowerlimit} and t.upperstandard=#{upperstandard} and t.upperamount=#{upperamount} and t.lowerstandard=#{lowerstandard} and t.loweramount=#{loweramount} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.gradesame=#{gradesame} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select count(*) from l_grain_inspect_item t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.upperlimit=#{upperlimit} and t.lowerlimit=#{lowerlimit} and t.upperstandard=#{upperstandard} and t.upperamount=#{upperamount} and t.lowerstandard=#{lowerstandard} and t.loweramount=#{loweramount} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.gradesame=#{gradesame} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

SELECT t.*,li.ItemName,li.ItemField,li.ItemRateField FROM l_grain_inspect_item t LEFT JOIN l_inspect_item li on li.InspectItemID=t.inspectItemID where 1=1 and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
SELECT t.*,li.ItemName,li.ItemField,li.ItemRateField FROM l_gb_grain_inspect_item t LEFT JOIN l_inspect_item li on li.InspectItemID=t.inspectItemID where 1=1 and t.grainid=#{grainid}
select count(*) from l_grain_inspect_item where 1=1 and grainid=#{grainid} and inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and keyid!=#{keyid}
